name: Microtel Inn & Suites by Wyndham Plattsburgh

reviews.text: I was recommended to stay at this hotel as "the nicest option in Plattsburgh." If true, don't stay in a hotel in Plattsburgh. Do yourself a favor and drive the extra hour into Montreal or convince your child that a different SUNY school would be a better choice. Despite a reservation guarantee, my room type was not available when I arrived in the late afternoon for check-in. Though I was given a non-smoking room as I requested, it was on a mixed smoking / non-smoking floor and the non-smoking policy was not enforced in the non-smoking rooms around mine. I requested a transfer as adjacent rooms were loud and smoke-filled (despite the alleged "smoke-free environment"). Front desk staff was unwilling to remedy any of the problems during my stay.
reviews.title: Horrible experience. Stay away!

reviews.text: This hotel is a gem. The rooms are so interestingly laid out - we had a suite-let, as it were, with an efficiently laid out kitchenette, a very comfortable dining table, and a very comfortable bed. I loved the blonde wood and modernity - almost a boutique atmosphere at these prices and at this unexpected location. I was racing up to Montreal on business and I was so tired so I appreciated the efficient front-desk personnel (a handsome young French-Canadian, I think).
reviews.title: Bright and Modern

likes.liked: — The modern, bright, and airy room

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night. The hotel seems new and the room was a nice size with comfortable beds and a small refrigerator and microwave. We had 2 beds but there's also a window seat with cushion and a child could sleep there. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Typical continental breakfast but the coffee was better...Green Mt coffee. We'd definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay

reviews.text: We had left another hotel, becasue its deplorable condition and the Microtel accomodated us on the busiest weekend of the year. They moved us from one room to another the next day, and made sure we could just transfer easily.
reviews.title: Excellent service

likes.liked: — The people at the front desk, the staff in general. They went out of their way for us.

reviews.text: They were kind, accomodating and generous with their time and advise.
reviews.title: Very accommodating hotel!

likes.liked: — The cleanliness of the room and friendly and accommodating front desk person

reviews.text: The suite we had for three of us provided ample room, complete with two tv's, a microwave, refrig and granite counter that served as a room divider. The concept was very good. The staff were friendly, helpful and accessible. The green mountain coffee in the lobby was great and the breakfast selection each morning was just right. This is a hotel I would recommend to anyone and look forward to staying here again.
reviews.title: Definitely exceeded our expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The decor in most modern hotels reminds me of the inside of an envelope, but I really found the Microtel quite nice. And whatever my biases against bland builder-beige styling, this place more than makes up for it by remaining super clean, super nice, and super helpful.
reviews.title: Neat, Tidy, Gets the Job Done Nicely

reviews.text: The extras are really quite wonderful - A computer in the lobby for free guest use, a nice sitting room downstairs, a far-better-than-average continental breakfast, and Green Mountain coffee available all day long.
reviews.title: Im not complaining

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was very kind, and not in a creepy way. Even after checkout when we called to ask if we had left some keys in the room, they checked a second time without being asked. Other perks include great beds and that fact that the parking lot is easy to get into and out of ... a rare feature in the chain store and big box area of Plattsburgh.
reviews.title: I don't think that you can get better value for the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You go, Microtel. Awesome.
reviews.title: Everything we want in a reasonably priced hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at the Microtel for two nights in a queen suite. The room was very clean, bright, and large. The staff seemed friendly and helpful. It was a great value for our money and will stay again if we are in the area.
reviews.title: Very comfortable stay at Microtel

likes.disliked: — location to event that we went to

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed on a Saturday night. Small rooms, but exceptionally clean, modern and comfortable. Friendly, courteous staff. We previously stayed at the Comfort Inn in Plattsburgh for twice the price. Close by to restaurants and stores. Nice breakfast in the morning although we only had time for coffee.If I had any complaints, it would be that the tub in the bathroom was extremely small and narrow, barely enough room to sit and not really able to soak, as is my first priority after a long day traveling. Also there were just enough towels in the bathroom, and not extremely large or plush. I would, however recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: clean room,great price

likes.liked: — clean room at a good price

reviews.text: I was referred to this hotel by a friend and although I didn't have great expectations, I was very pleasantly surprised!
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were so welcoming and helpful with directions and suggestions.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.disliked: — Hour from Lake Placid (where the event was)

reviews.text: Although small, my room was clean and well appointed. The bathroom was stocked with everything you need, including bath towels of a nice size.
reviews.title: Great hotel!!!!

reviews.text: The hotel was clean, the staff was courteous and had everything ready for you. I have stayed at this hotel multiple times and is the hotel of choice.
reviews.title: Excellent affordable and clean

reviews.text: My husband & I along with about 5 other families stayed at the Microtel last weekend for a family party and were very happy with our choice. Our room was immaculate as was the entire hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location is great, within walking distance to restaurants and stores. The rates were very reasonable and even included a continental breakfast. The only negative is that the walls are very thin - I could actually hear the person in the next room to us snoring at night. Other than that, I would definitely recommend staying here.
reviews.title: Very happy with the Microtel in Plattsburgh
Repeat visitor disappointed this time!
reviews.text: Hi, i have stayed at the Microtel twice before. My son will be a freshman at Plattsburgh, and each of the two times I came up to visit the campus with him, I relied on tripadvisor rankings and was thoroughly satisfied.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When my son came up in July for orientation, I booked at the front desk two further stays: check-in in August and parent's weekend in September. I liked the hotel and wanted to make sure we could stay there during those designated dates.
reviews.title: Not sure why it was #1

reviews.text: When I called 10 days before freshmen move-in to confirm, I was told by the hotel that they did not have my reservation. Yet, when I called the Microtel 1-800 customer service number, they had my reservation for 2 nights in a queen suite. When I called the Plattsburgh Microtel back, i spoke to Kristy numerous times and also their manager, they could see my reservations on the 1-800 site, but not on their Plattsburgh site. Utlimately , what happened was, we got I queen room, no suite for 1 Friday night. No apologies, no explanations, even though the manager could see the reservation on the 1-800 general customer service screen. I will say that everyone I spoke to was exceedingly polite!
reviews.title: The best

reviews.text: Pleasant room, except for the 10-12 15-18 year old females that inhabited the room next to us and down the hall. I believe I am being graceful in saying that I got 3 hours of sleep that night. The walls are paper thin, the girls were screaming, slamming doors, going back and forth. I knew every detail of their social life!
reviews.title: Fabulous hospitality, safe and friendly hotel
